title: Pando Media Booster is packaged with Lol installer. WTF
body: Re-installing league from official oce site, one of the first things that comes up is fucking Pando setup information, then will you allow Pando Media Booster to make changes to your computer.  This fucking malware ass garbage bandwith eating scum program is bundled with League, anti-malware scans show it comes with Trojan viruses and more, this fucking makes my blood boil.{{champion:20}}

replies.body:
Hi R0b0cop

Can you please provide a link to the page where you downloaded this version of the client? I'll need to look into this.

https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload
sorry I forgot about this

Edit: Tried it again, newest installer (from above site) same thing. 
Screenshots:
imgur.com/Cali8tG
imgur.com/fDfWsfT
imgur.com/gFTRWAV (show details)
imgur.com/JfOvdBT
The installer version at this link has been changed. Thanks!
Yay again, thanks for listening to me.

You must be using an old version of the installer, the current one is free from Pando Media Booster. 
If it gets on your pc it's relitively simple to remove via Programs and Features. It was a legitimate program but it got hyjacked a few years back and is now malware.
I'm using the most recent one. I tried it today.
